summary: TAKATA RECALL WITH BMW 328I  I WAS SENT A NOTICE BY BMW IN FEB. 2016 ABOUT THE RECALL AND THAT THE PARTS TO REPAIR IT WERE NOT AVAILABLE YET.  IT'S BEEN 6 MONTHS.  THERE HAS TO BE A REMEDY TO FIX THIS PROBLEM BEFORE AN ACCIDENT OCCURS.  THE POTENTIAL HARM FROM THIS IS "SERIOUS INJURY OR DEATH."  THIS IS NOT SOMETHING THAT SHOULD TAKE 6 MONTHS TO REPAIR.
